sentences.sContent: Session fixation allows intruders to intercept authenticated sessions or to create new sessions and to capture the session identifier.
sentences.sContent_eng: Session fixation allows intruders to intercept authenticated sessions or to create new sessions and to capture the session identifier.
sentences.sCn: 会话固定允许入侵者截获验证后的会话，或者创建新会话并捕获会话标识符。

sentences.sContent: The focus of pleasure shifts to the genitals and fixation can lead to excessive masculinity in females or in males, or, if you're female, need for attention or domination.
sentences.sContent_eng: The focus of pleasure shifts to the genitals and fixation can lead to excessive masculinity in females or in males, or, if you're female, need for attention or domination.
sentences.sCn: 性器官成为了快乐的主要来源,固着在此阶段，会导致女性或男性,过分男性化，或是导致女性产生对于关注或控制的欲求。

sentences.sContent: But they don't stare with a kind of fixation that I do, trying to make contact with whatever is going on even if I never talk to the person or touch the person or have anything do with the person.
sentences.sContent_eng: But they don't stare with a kind of fixation that I do, trying to make contact with whatever is going on even if I never talk to the person or touch the person or have anything do with the person.
sentences.sCn: 但他们不会一直固定地盯着一个人看,想知道那个人在想什么发生了什么事,即使我不和那个人说话,不碰那个人,并且和那个人没有任何关系。

phrases.pCn: 生物固氮；生物固氮酌；生物固氮作用

固定的；定色的；防挥发的
设备；固定装置；固定于某处不大可能移动之物
固定器；[摄] 定影剂；毒贩子；调停者
